description:
This course teaches beginners what SQL is and how it works. The course materials are all videos making it easy to follow along. The course is less than 2 hours long and structured in a logical and easy to follow functional way. This course is easy to follow and will teach a beginner how to create , read , update and delete data from a database. (C.R.U.D) which are the four main things that SQL is used for on a database.

The video courses includes:

  • SQL SUB LANGUAGES
  • Creating Tables
  • Updating Data
  • Deleting Data
  • Reading Data
  • Restricting and Sorting Data
  • Adding Data to Database
  • Operators
  • Data types and Constraints
title: Oracle SQL  : Hands on Practical Step by Step Training
